name: Bullet Gun: Survival Shoot
description:
Load up your gun and get ready to give some bullets to bad guys in our new game. You are will play as mr Boss in this survival simulator and your main target is to gift some bullets from your gun to bad guys. Mr Boss has his enemy hit-list, so why don’t you help him and deliver some bullets to from his gun to guys from the list. Some thugs from the enemy hit-list has hostages, so you will have to shoot the bandits and keep hostage uninjured. As always, you will earn tokens for completing levels, which you can spend on new guns and skins, which will bring you more fun in the process of crossing out names from your enemy hit list. So load up your gun, and help Mr Boss to get rid of all his enemies by delivering them some bullets from his gun in our new survival simulator: Bullet Gun: Survival Shoot.

In our new survival simulator, you will have to find all your aiming skills and use them. Load up your gun and shoot all bandits to help mr Boss pass the level, and get rid of everyone, who is in your enemy hit-list. For completing levels, you will earn tokens, which you can spend on better guns or new outfit for Mr Boss. All bandits will pass away from your very first shot. Each following level is harder than the previous, so you will have to spend bullets from your gun wiser. Deliver the bullets from your gun to the bad guys and pass every level. Be cautious, if Mr Boss will shoot the hostage in our survival simulator, mr bos will lose, so try to keep hostages undamaged. Load up your gun and deliver all your bullets to the bandits. Shoot every bad guy and save hostages in our survival simulator.

Bullet Gun: Survival Shoot is a free to play survival simulator. Shoot these bandits with bullets from your gun. Make sure that the hostages will be saved by mr Boss and will not have any injuries. Cross out names from your enemy hit-list one by one and get closer to your target. Also do not forget that you can shoot bad guys with one bullet using mechanics of ricochet, but make sure that bullets from your gun will not touch hostages. Buy new guns and outfit to defeat bandits faster and with style. Just Load up your gun and run this survival simulator. How far can you reach without shooting hostages? Download Bullet Gun: Survival Shoot to find out.
